Module io.inverno.mod.base
Package io.inverno.mod.base.converter

Interface ObjectConverter<From>

Type Parameters:
From - the encoded type
All Superinterfaces:
Converter<From,Object>, Decoder<From,Object>, Encoder<Object,From>, JoinableEncoder<Object,From>, JoinablePrimitiveEncoder<From>, PrimitiveDecoder<From>, PrimitiveEncoder<From>, SplittableDecoder<From,Object>, SplittablePrimitiveDecoder<From>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteBufConverter, ParameterConverter, StringCompositeConverter, StringConverter, TextByteBufMediaTypeConverter
public interface ObjectConverter<From> extends Converter<From,Object>, SplittablePrimitiveDecoder<From>, JoinablePrimitiveEncoder<From>

An object converter which is splittable and joinable with primitive conversion bindings.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
